src:
Gagal Jadi Ketua Umum PSSI, Arif Putra Wicaksono Tunjukkan Sikap Kesatria
02 Nov 2019, 15:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arif Putra Wicaksono kesatria menanggapi kekalahannya pada ajang pemilihan Ketua Umum PSSI. CEO Nine Sports tersebut mengaku menerima kegagalannya terpilih sebagai nakhoda federasi sepak bola Indonesia.
"Kekalahan ini adalah hal yang menyakitkan. Namun, ini adalah bagian dari hidup," ucap Arif.
"Ini adalah kongres pertama saya. Selain itu, saya lihat Iwan Bule (sapaan karib Ketua Umum PSSI Terpilih, M. Iriawan) sudah lama promosi. Timnya pun solid," sambungnya.
Sebelumnya, Arif Putra Wicaksono dipastikan gagal terpilih sebagai Ketua Umum PSSI. Dalam pemilihan di ajang Kongres Luar Biasa, yang digelar di Jakarta, Sabtu (02/11), ia kalah telak dari Iwan Bule.
Pada pemilihan ini, dari 85 voter, Iwan mendapat 82 suara. Sementara, Arif dan para calon lainnya tak mendapat satu pun suara. Tiga suara lain dianggap tidak sah.
Pemilihan Ketua Umum ini sendiri hanya diikuti tiga calon saja. Selain Arif dan Ibul, ada sosok Rahim Soekasah. Sementara, tujuh calon lain -termasuk La Nyalla Mattalitti- sudah mengundurkan diri.
Sebagai pendamping Ketua Umum, terpilihlah Iwan Budianto dan Cucu Somantri sebagai wakil. Iwan mendapat 74 suara, sedangkan Cucu mendapat 81 suara.

Apa harapan Arif pada kepemimpinan Ibul? Simak di bawah ini.
text:
Failure to Become PSSI Chairperson, Arif Putra Wicaksono Shows Warrior Attitudes
02 Nov 2019, 15:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arif Putra Wicaksono knight responded to his defeat at the PSSI General Election event. The Nine Sports CEO claimed to accept his failure to be elected as the skipper of the Indonesian soccer federation.
"This defeat is a painful thing. However, this is a part of life," Arif said.
"This is my first congress. In addition, I see Iwan Bule (the nickname of the Chairperson of the Chosen PSSI, M. Iriawan) has been promoting for a long time. His team was solid," he continued.
Previously, Arif Putra Wicaksono certainly failed to be elected as the General Chair of PSSI. In the election at the Extraordinary Congress event, which was held in Jakarta, Saturday (02/11), he was defeated by Iwan Bule.
In this election, from 85 voters, Iwan got 82 votes. Meanwhile, Arif and the other candidates did not get any votes. Three other votes are considered invalid.
The election of the Chairperson itself was only followed by three candidates. Besides Arif and Ibul, there is the figure of Rahim Soekasah. Meanwhile, seven other candidates - including La Nyalla Mattalitti - have resigned.
As a companion to the General Chair, Iwan Budianto and Cucu Somantri were chosen as representatives. Iwan got 74 votes, while Cucu got 81 votes.

What are Arif's hopes for Ibul's leadership? See below.
